sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import classes from './Cart.module.css'; import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux'; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import {AiOutlineClose} from 'react-icons/ai' import { removeProduct } from "../../ReactRedux/CartSlice"; const Cart = ()=>{ return(
{products.length > 0 ? products.map((product) => (
handleRemoveProduct(product._id)} className={classes.closeBtn}>

{product.title}

{product.quantity} x ${product.price}
)) :

No products in the cart. Go shopping!

}
Total products: {products.length}
Subtotal: ${totalPrice} Order now
) } export default Cart
